conteudo.original:
Go to Create Route to create the circuit layout first.

Press <Color:255,255,255,255><Sign:0><Color:0,0,0,255> to start making a circuit, then use <Color:255,255,255,255><Sign:43><Sign:44><Sign:31><Sign:32><Color:0,0,0,255> or <Color:255,255,255,255><Sign:57><Sign:58><Sign:59><Sign:60><Color:0,0,0,255> to lay down
the track. You can change the height with <Color:255,255,255,255><Sign:6><Color:0,0,0,255> and <Color:255,255,255,255><Sign:7><Color:0,0,0,255>.
conteudo.traducao:
Go to Create Route to create the circuit layout first.

Press <Color:255,255,255,255><Sign:0><Color:0,0,0,255> to start making a circuit, then use <Color:255,255,255,255><Sign:43><Sign:44><Sign:31><Sign:32><Color:0,0,0,255> or <Color:255,255,255,255><Sign:57><Sign:58><Sign:59><Sign:60><Color:0,0,0,255> to lay down
the track. You can change the height with <Color:255,255,255,255><Sign:6><Color:0,0,0,255> and <Color:255,255,255,255><Sign:7><Color:0,0,0,255>.

conteudo.original:
Sometimes when you collect your profits, one of the Five Billionaires will
challenge you to a money battle.

The manager assigned to that area will try to counter the effects of the
billionaire's aggressive investment, but if their HP runs out, you will lose the
targeted property.

Protect your property by pressing <Color:255,255,255,255><Sign:0><Color:0,0,0,255> to invest your own money and restore
the manager's HP.
conteudo.traducao:
Sometimes when you collect your profits, one of the Five Billionaires will
challenge you to a money battle.

The manager assigned to that area will try to counter the effects of the
billionaire's aggressive investment, but if their HP runs out, you will lose the
targeted property.

Protect your property by pressing <Color:255,255,255,255><Sign:0><Color:0,0,0,255> to invest your own money and restore
the manager's HP.

conteudo.original:
Select Real Estate Royale Management and press <Color:255,255,255,255><Sign:1><Color:0,0,0,255> to display a payout
collection confirmation window. If you have assigned a manager or security
guard to the area you want to collect from, their salaries will also be listed.
Select Yes to confirm.
conteudo.traducao:
Select Real Estate Royale Management and press <Color:255,255,255,255><Sign:1><Color:0,0,0,255> to display a Pagamento
collection confirmation window. If you have assigned a manager or security
guard to the area you want to collect from, their salaries will also be listed.
Select Yes to confirm.

conteudo.original:
Press <Color:255,255,255,255><Sign:1><Color:0,0,0,255> to approach a customer's table if any trouble arises, it's time for
the check, or if a hostess calls for your help.

You will be shown several options. Making the right decision can boost
customer satisfaction or pacify any troublemakers.
conteudo.traducao:
Press <Color:255,255,255,255><Sign:1><Color:0,0,0,255> to approach a customer's table if any trouble arises, it's time for
the check, or if a hostess calls for your help.

You will be shown several options. Making the right decision can boost
customer satisfaction or pacify any troublemakers.

conteudo.original:
Checking in on tables is an opportunity to
lend your staff a helping hand. Wait too long
and you may lose your chance, so keep your
eye open and hurry on over when you spot a
signal.

Checking in on tables is an opportunity to
lend your staff a helping hand. Wait too long

signal.

conteudo.original: Shoot the right dialogue lines to build up the mood. But if you hit the wrong\nwords, your character might say something that could upset the girl.\nUpset a girl too many times, and she may hang up on you.
conteudo.traducao: Shoot the right dialogue lines to build up the mood. But if you hit the wrong\nwords, your character might say something that could upset the girl.\nUpset a girl too many times, and she may hang up on you.

conteudo.original:
If you want to hang up, hold <Color:255,255,255,255><Sign:6><Color:0,0,0,255>. This can be useful if
you get a bad feeling about a girl based on how she
sounds. Not every caller will be your type, and her voice can
be a clue.
conteudo.traducao:

you get a bad feeling about a girl based on how she
sounds. Not every caller will be your type, and her voice can
be a clue.

conteudo.original:
The first roulette enables you to ask about the girl's body, and the second
about her face. With this info, your idea of  what the firl looks like will grow more
detailed.

The third roulette will let you ask the girl out on a date. Succeed in picking the
right line, and she will agree to meet with you.

The choices will be spinning quickly, but the right one will be highlighted. Press
the <Color:255,255,255,255><Sign:0><Color:0,0,0,255> button when it is at the front.
conteudo.traducao:
The first roulette enables you to ask about the girl's body, and the second
about her face. With this info, your idea of  what the firl looks like will grow more
detailed.

The third roulette will let you ask the girl out on a date. Succeed in picking the
right line, and she will agree to meet with you.

The choices will be spinning quickly, but the right one will be highlighted. Press
the <Color:255,255,255,255><Sign:0><Color:0,0,0,255> button when it is at the front.

conteudo.original:
Download save data from the server to share progress
with a PlayStation®3, or between a PlayStation®4
and PlayStation®Vita. Sign in to PlayStation<Sign:57>Network using the same online ID for both upload and download.

<Color:5>You can overwrite story and completion progress
with the save data downloaded from the server.

Be careful when managing old and new save data, as
even after completing the game, if the downloaded
save data is from before the end of the game, your
story and completion progress will reset to that point.
conteudo.traducao:
Download save data from the server to share progress
with a PlayStation®3, or between a PlayStation®4
and PlayStation®Vita. Sign in to PlayStation<Sign:57>Network using the same online ID for both upload and download.

<Color:5>You can overwrite story and completion progress
with the save data downloaded from the server.

Be careful when managing old and new save data, as
even after completing the game, if the downloaded
save data is from before the end of the game, your
story and completion progress will reset to that point.

conteudo.original:
Upload save data to the server to share progress
with a PlayStation®3, or between a PlayStation®4
and PlayStation®Vita. Sign in to PlayStation<Sign:57>Network using the same online ID for both upload and download.

<Color:5>Additionally, images taken at the photo booth will not be included in the save data, so it will not be uploaded to the server. So please be aware that the photo booth pictures will not be transferred over in the download.
conteudo.traducao:
Upload save data to the server to share progress
with a PlayStation®3, or between a PlayStation®4
and PlayStation®Vita. Sign in to PlayStation<Sign:57>Network using the same online ID for both upload and download.

<Color:5>Additionally, images taken at the photo booth will not be included in the save data, so it will not be uploaded to the server. So please be aware that the photo booth pictures will not be transferred over in the download.

Save data?

After this, you will be unable to backtrack.
We recommend that you create new save data
instead of overwriting.

Save data?

conteudo.original:
Create Game Clear Data that can be used in new modes added after completing the game.
All elements will be saved, but when starting New Game+ with Game Clear Data,
completion for a number of things, such as substories, will not be carried over.
Starting Premium Adventure mode with this data will retain all completion.

We recommend that you create new save data to avoid overwriting.

Save Game Clear Data?
conteudo.traducao:
Create Game Clear Data that can be used in new modes added after completing the game.
All elements will be saved, but when starting New Game+ with Game Clear Data,
completion for a number of things, such as substories, will not be carried over.
Starting Premium Adventure mode with this data will retain all completion.

We recommend that you create new save data to avoid overwriting.

Save Game Clear Data?

conteudo.traducao: But you don't just stand there and watch!\nYou can give your car a boost of speed, for\nexample.

conteudo.original: Try it now. Press <Sign:1> to use the boost!
conteudo.traducao: Experimente agora. Pressione <Sign:1> para usar o impulso!

conteudo.original: Now that's what I call speed! But the number\nof times you can boost your car is limited and\nit makes it easy to fall out of lane.
conteudo.traducao: Now that's what I call speed! But the number\nof times you can boost your car is limited and\nit makes it easy to fall out of lane.
